- Front exterior wall: painted masonry/concrete block with horizontal groove lines; light green siding, red trim around window/door.  
- Screened porch: aluminum/framed enclosure with screen, entry door openable to interior.  
- Windows/doors: window with red shutters; exterior door at porch entry.  
- Landscaping: brick-edged raised bed along the foundation; drought-tolerant plants (small tree, yucca).  
- Lawn: dormant/dry brown grass; overall neat spacing and minimal weeds.  
- Lighting: landscape lighting along brick border (low-voltage path lights).
